forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 16C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 60F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 58F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 48F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 19C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 67F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 10C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 50F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 17C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 64F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low near 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low around 50F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain diminishing to a few showers late. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain diminishing to a few showers late. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 17C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 63F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 15C. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 58F. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
